area.warning-summary: Strong Wind Warning for Saturday for Batemans Coast and Eden Coast

forecast-period.warning-summary: Strong Wind Warning for Saturday for Batemans Coast and Eden Coast
forecast-period.text: A high pressure system in the Bight is extending a ridge into New South Wale in the wake of a cold front. This high is expected to maintain a ridge over coastal parts for the next few days as it drifts slowly east, likely reaching the Tasman Sea early in the new week. As a result, coastal winds should remain generally southerly through this period.
Wind gusts can be 40 percent stronger than the averages given here, and maximum waves may be up to twice the height.
Details of warnings are available on the Bureau's website www.bom.gov.au, by telephone 1300-659-218* or through some TV and radio broadcasts.
* Calls to 1300 numbers cost around 27.5c incl. GST, higher from mobiles or public phones.
Check the latest Coastal Waters Forecasts for information on wind, wave and weather conditions for neighbouring coastal zones.

area.description: Byron Coast: Point Danger to Wooli

forecast-period.text: Winds: North to northwesterly 15 to 20 knots shifting south to southeasterly in the morning, locally reaching 25 knots in the afternoon. Seas: 1 to 2 metres. Swell: Easterly 1 to 1.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 60% chance of showers. The chance of a thunderstorm in the morning.

Winds: Southeasterly 15 to 20 knots, reaching 25 knots offshore in the morning. Seas: 1 to 2 metres. Swell: Southerly around 1 metre, increasing to 1.5 to 2.5 metres during the morning. Weather: Cloudy. 70% chance of showers.

Winds: South to southeasterly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southeasterly 1.5 to 2.5 metres. Swell: Easterly 1 to 1.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 60% chance of showers. The chance of a thunderstorm.

area.description: Coffs Coast: Wooli to Smoky Cape

forecast-period.text: Winds: South to southwesterly 15 to 25 knots turning southeasterly 15 to 20 knots in the late afternoon. Seas: 1 to 2 metres. Swell: South to southeasterly around 1 metre. Swell: Northeasterly 1 to 1.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers.

Winds: South to southeasterly 10 to 15 knots, reaching 20 knots offshore in the morning. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southerly 1 to 1.5 metres, increasing to 1.5 to 2.5 metres during the morning. Weather: Cloudy. 70% chance of showers.

Winds: South to southeasterly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southeasterly 1.5 to 2 metres. Swell: Easterly 1 to 1.5 metres. Weather: Cloudy. 70% chance of showers. The chance of a thunderstorm.

area.description: Macquarie Coast: Smoky Cape to Seal Rocks

forecast-period.text: Winds: Southwesterly 15 to 20 knots, reaching 25 knots north of Crowdy Head at first, turning south to southeasterly during the day. Seas: 1.5 to 2.5 metres, decreasing to 1 to 1.5 metres during the morning. Swell: Southerly around 1 metre, increasing to 1.5 to 2 metres south of Port Macquarie during the afternoon and evening. Swell: Northeasterly 1 to 1.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers.

Winds: Southerly 10 to 15 knots turning southeasterly in the afternoon, reaching 20 knots offshore in the evening. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southerly 2 to 3 metres, tending. Weather: Partly cloudy. 70% chance of showers.

Winds: Southeasterly 10 to 15 knots turning southerly 15 to 20 knots during the morning. Seas: Around 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres offshore. Swell: Southeasterly 2 metres. Swell: Easterly 1 to 1.5 metres, decreasing to around 1 metre during the afternoon or evening. Weather: Cloudy. 70% chance of showers. The chance of a thunderstorm.

area.description: Hunter Coast: Seal Rocks to Broken Bay

forecast-period.text: Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 15 knots, reaching 20 knots offshore in the morning, turning south to southeasterly in the afternoon and evening. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southeasterly around 1 metre, tending southerly 1.5 to 2.5 metres during the day. Swell: East to northeasterly around 1 metre. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers. Caution: Large and powerful surf conditions in the afternoon and evening are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as crossing bars by boat and rock fishing.
Winds: South to southeasterly 10 to 15 knots, reaching 20 knots offshore in the evening. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southerly 2 to 3 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 70% chance of showers.

Winds: Southeasterly 10 to 15 knots turning southerly 15 to 20 knots during the morning. Seas: Around 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres offshore. Swell: Southerly 2 metres, tending southeasterly 1.5 to 2 metres during the morning. Swell: Easterly around 1 metre. Weather: Cloudy. 60% chance of showers.

Swell: Southerly 1 to 2 metres, increasing to 2 to 3 metres during the afternoon and evening. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers. Caution: Large and powerful surf conditions in the afternoon and evening are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as crossing bars by boat and rock fishing.
Winds: South to southeasterly 10 to 15 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southerly 2 to 3 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 70% chance of showers.

Winds: Southeasterly 10 to 15 knots tending southerly 15 to 20 knots during the morning. Seas: Around 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres during the afternoon or evening. Swell: Southerly 2 metres. Weather: Cloudy. 60% chance of showers.

area.description: Illawarra Coast: Port Hacking to Ulladulla

forecast-period.text: Winds: Southwesterly 15 to 20 knots, reaching 25 knots south of Port Kembla in the morning, turning south to southeasterly in the afternoon and evening. Seas: 1.5 to 2.5 metres. Swell: Southerly 1 to 1.5 metres, increasing to 2 to 3 metres during the day. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers late this afternoon and evening. Caution: Large and powerful surf conditions in the afternoon and evening are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as crossing bars by boat and rock fishing.

Winds: Southerly 15 to 20 knots turning southeasterly 10 to 15 knots in the morning. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southerly 2 to 3 metres, increasing to 4 metres offshore. Weather: Partly cloudy. 70% chance of showers.
Winds: Southeasterly 10 to 15 knots turning southerly 15 to 20 knots during the morning. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southeasterly 1.5 to 2 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 60% chance of showers.

area.description: Batemans Coast: Ulladulla to Montague Island

forecast-period.warning-summary: Strong Wind Warning for Saturday for Batemans Coast
forecast-period.text: Winds: Southwesterly 20 to 25 knots, reaching up to 30 knots offshore south of Moruya Heads in the late morning and afternoon. Winds turning southerly 15 to 25 knots in the evening. Seas: 1 to 2 metres. Swell: Southerly 1.5 to 2.5 metres, increasing to 2.5 to 4 metres offshore. Weather: Mostly sunny day. 40% chance of showers in the late afternoon and evening. Caution: Large and powerful surf conditions are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as crossing bars by boat and rock fishing.

Winds: Southerly 15 to 20 knots turning southeasterly 10 to 15 knots in the afternoon. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southerly 2 to 3 metres, increasing to 4 metres offshore. Weather: Partly cloudy. 60% chance of showers.
Winds: Southerly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southerly 2 metres, tending southeasterly 1.5 to 2 metres during the morning. Weather: Partly cloudy. 50% chance of showers.

area.description: Eden Coast: Montague Island to Gabo Island

forecast-period.warning-summary: Strong Wind Warning for Saturday for Eden Coast
forecast-period.text: Winds: Southwesterly 20 to 25 knots, reaching up to 30 knots in the far south and offshore during the morning and afternoon. Winds turning southerly 15 to 20 knots in the evening. Seas: 1.5 to 2 metres. Swell: Southerly 3 to 4 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers. Caution: Large and powerful surf conditions are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as crossing bars by boat and rock fishing.

Winds: South to southeasterly 10 to 15 knots, reaching 20 knots early in the morning. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Southerly 3 to 4 metres, decreasing to 2 to 3 metres during the day. Weather: Partly cloudy. 50% chance of showers.

Winds: Southerly 10 to 15 knots turning southeasterly during the evening. Seas: Around 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres offshore north of Merimbula during the morning. Swell: Southerly 2 metres. Weather: Cloudy. 50% chance of showers.
